metadata.title: CVE-2016-7046 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (EAP) 7, when operating as a reverse-proxy with default buffer sizes, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU and disk consumption) via a long URL.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.3-1').
